ud7.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava mallesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena thunam nama mallanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
ud7.9:1.4: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito mallesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim thunam anuppatto”ti.
ud7.9:1.5: (…) Udapanam tinassa ca bhusassa ca yava mukhato puresum:
ud7.9:2.1: Atha kho bhagava magga okkamma yena rukkhamulam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
ud7.9:2.2: Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud7.9:2.3: “ingha me tvam, ananda, etamha udapana paniyam ahara”ti.
ud7.9:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud7.9:3.2: “idani so, bhante, udapano thuneyyakehi brahmanagahapatikehi tinassa ca bhusassa ca yava mukhato purito:
ud7.9:4.2: tatiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud7.9:4.3: “ingha me tvam, ananda, etamha udapana paniyam ahara”ti.
ud7.9:4.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva pattam gahetva yena so udapano tenupasankami.
ud7.9:4.5: Atha kho so udapano ayasmante anande upasankamante sabbam tam tinanca bhusanca mukhato ovamitva acchassa udakassa anavilassa vippasannassa yava mukhato purito vissandanto manne atthasi.
ud7.9:5.2: “acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, tathagatassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata.
ud7.9:5.3: Ayanhi so udapano mayi upasankamante sabbam tam tinanca bhusanca mukhato ovamitva acchassa udakassa anavilassa vippasannassa yava mukhato purito vissandanto manne thito”ti.
ud7.9:5.4: Pattena paniyam adaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud7.9:5.5: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, tathagatassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata.
ud7.9:5.6: Ayanhi so, bhante, udapano mayi upasankamante sabbam tam tinanca bhusanca mukhato ovamitva acchassa udakassa anavilassa vippasannassa yava mukhato purito vissandanto manne atthasi.
ud7.9:5.7: Pivatu bhagava paniyam, pivatu sugato paniyan”ti.
ud7.9:6.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
